Ashoka was an ancient Indian emperor of the Maurya Dynasty who ruled almost all of the Indian subcontinent from â€‰268 to 232 BCE.One of Indias greatest emperors, Ashoka reigned over a realm that stretched from the Hindu Kush mountains in Afghanistan to the modern state of Bangladesh in the east. It covered the entire Indian subcontinent except parts of present day Tamil Nadu, Karnataka and Kerala. The empires capital was Pataliputra , with provincial capitals at Taxila and Ujjain
